Gem.Name: Diamond
Gem.Description: A diamond (from the ancient Greek ἀδάμας – adámas, meaning "unbreakable", "proper", or "unalterable") is one of the best-known and most sought-after gemstones

Gem.Name: Amber
Gem.Description: Amber is fossilized tree resin (not sap), which has been appreciated for its color and natural beauty since Neolithic times

Gem.Name: Topaz
Gem.Description: Topaz is a silicate mineral of aluminium and fluorine with the chemical formula Al2SiO4(F,OH)2.
